_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Ultimate Zigbee Hub - Professional device categorization system with 1500+ compatible devices. Organized by device function: Motion Detection, Contact Security, Smart Lighting, Power Control, Climate Monitoring, Safety Detection, and Automation Control. Users select devices by what they DO, not by brand. Universal compatibility across all manufacturers. SDK3 compliant with local Zigbee 3.0 operation and no cloud dependencies.

name.en: 18W 15W Tuya zigbee Smart Home Led Lamp

instruction.en: Press and hold the button on your 18W 15W Tuya zigbee Smart Home Led Lamp for 3 seconds until the LED starts blinking rapidly.
Press and hold the button on your 2 Gang Zigbee Dimmer for 3 seconds until the LED starts blinking rapidly.

Press and hold the button on your _TZE200_vvmbj46n for 3 seconds until the LED starts blinking rapidly.
Press and hold the button on your Air Quality Sensor for 3 seconds until the LED starts blinking rapidly.
